CSGO a game with out a need for an introduction. Still one of the greatest FPS game around.
Games mechanics need to be refined but it is overall a nice game but it should not be FREE!
A spectacular game. Competitive matchmaking is fun and engaging. There are many non-ranked mini games to play. You can spend endless hours in this game and never get bored.

great game with endless fun.  2000 hours and still not bored
Muito bom jogo para passar o tempo!

CSGO is a game that i have a touph time with i dont give the thumbs down because its a bad game? its one of the most stable competitive games out there everything works well and doesent need reworks, my biggest issue is how easy the game always feels i barely ever play this game and when i do come back to it for the odd game i always seem to get ranked so high because every match i play the people suck? i always consistently sit at a MGE- this feels undeserved as i do not sink the time needed to become this rank into the game which is where my complaint comes from, the lack of skill gap and a fairly above average rank (going of the fact majority of players are high silver low gold) means this game doesent have me wanting to improve or wanting to push myself to learn new tactics maps, or weapons and this is a dealbreaker for someone who likes to learn comp FPS and push myself.

7/10
Not bad if you want to get competitive :)
